concept.title: Introduction to World Time Pro
concept.shortdesc: This topic explains the tasks you can perform with World Time Pro.

conbody.p: World Time Pro is an easy way to add, subtract, multiply and divide units of time. Adding and subtracting hours, minutes and seconds can be tricky - there are 60 minutes in an hour, but how many are in 5.75 hours? World Time Pro quickly and accurately solves this and any other time-related problems for you.
Using World Time Pro, you can:

ul.li: add, subtract, multiply or divide periods of time
convert large numbers of minutes or seconds to hours this is errror
convert time in fractions to time in hours, minutes and seconds
calculate the day of the week that a particular date falls on
convert to and from military time

conbody.p: World Time Pro also features easy-to-use Help and a troubleshooting section to ensure that you're up and calculating in no time!
